details.title: Competitive Forecasting - Metaculus X Bridgewater Associates
info: Ranked 5th out of 500 undergraduates and 12th out of 850 open division in Bridgewater Associates x Metaculus $25,000 Forecasting competition.
Utilized monte-carlo, ARIMA, and other mathematical modeling techniques to achieve high accuracy predictions

details.title: Facilliator @ Non-Trivial Fellowship
info: Advised and guided a group of ~10 exceptionally talented students through specific research projects in the realms of AI and policy
Ran AI Governence journal clubs, advisory sessions and other notable events for the broader cohort of ~100 students.

details.title: Finacial Analyst Intern @ Interactive Brokers Group
info: Conducted in-depth competitive research presenting slide decks to upper management on competitive risk and AI integration
Modeled Option prices with Black Scholes Model using Vix index and other indicators of volatility
